title: Chinese typography
content:
hi all,  
They way people write Chinese , Is it have effect on emotions??  
by just looking at it Can people know in which feeling the text is written.
author: sonika

comments.content: In general, it isn't obvious whether a Chinese character has a positive or negative meaning just by looking at it.
I think the poster was asking about something more like graphology. In which case, . . . possibly?
